SUCCESSION_EVENT_WINDOW_HEIR_DREAD0:"[ROOT.Char.GetSheHe] вже має репутацію нещадної та жорстокої людини."
SUCCESSION_EVENT_WINDOW_HEIR_TRAIT_REVELER0:"Через свою чарівність [ROOT.Char.GetSheHe] купається в любові своїх підданих: всі раді бачити такого люб'язного правителя."
SUCCESSION_EVENT_WINDOW_HEIR_TRAIT_SCHOLAR0:"[ROOT.Char.GetSheHe|U] славиться своїм інтересом до метафізики і може виявитися не найкращим кандидатом на вирішення щоденних нагальних проблем."

column4: взагалі нічого не відчуває і нікого не любить."

column1: SUCCESSION_EVENT_WINDOW_HEIR_TRAIT_VENGEFUL0:"Васалам доведеться бути обережними поряд з цією дріб'язковою та злою душонкою."

column4: щоб вести за собою своїх підданих."
[ROOT.Char.GetSheHe] залишає державу в руках своїх помічників."

column1: SUCCESSION_EVENT_WINDOW_HEIR_TRAIT_EXCOMMUNICATED0:"Незважаючи на відлучення від церкви та тавро єретика
column2: [ROOT.Char.GetSheHe] приходить до влади. Багато хто впевнений

column5: а у битвах п'є кров своїх ворогів."

column1: SUCCESSION_EVENT_WINDOW_HEIR_TRAIT_CANNIBAL0:"Заслужити довіру васалів [ROOT.Char.GetHerHim] буде непросто: ходять чутки
SUCCESSION_EVENT_WINDOW_HEIR_TRAIT_CRIMINAL0:"Безліч чуток оточує [ROOT.Char.GetHerHis]: одні страшніші за інші."

column2: що [ROOT.Char.GetSheHe] змішує заборонені трави та насилає прокляття на своїх ворогів
column3: [ROOT.Char.GetHerHim] буде непросто заслужити довіру своїх підданих."

column5: оскільки у [ROOT.Char.GetHerHis] поки що немає жодних досягнень."

column1: SUCCESSION_EVENT_WINDOW_GAME_OVER_DECADES0:"Ви провели з династією [ROOT.Char.GetDynasty.GetName] кілька десятків років."

SUCCESSION_EVENT_WINDOW_END_DATE_UNIFICATION_SPANISH_DESC0:" It was due to your rule and guidance that the Spanish Thrones united under one ruler."
SUCCESSION_EVENT_WINDOW_END_DATE_UNIFICATION_SLAVS_DESC0:" The Slavs have become an unstoppable power since your founding of Empire of $e_slavia$."
SUCCESSION_EVENT_WINDOW_END_DATE_UNIFICATION_SOUTHERN_SLAVS_DESC0:" It was under your guidance that the Southern Slavs reclaimed their identity."
SUCCESSION_EVENT_WINDOW_END_DATE_UNIFICATION_WESTERN_SLAVS_DESC0:" It was due to you that the Western Slavs became one again after centuries of scattered tribalism. "
SUCCESSION_EVENT_WINDOW_END_DATE_UNIFICATION_BURGUNDY_DESC0:" The Burgundians overcame their squabbles and became one under your guidance and rule."
SUCCESSION_EVENT_WINDOW_END_DATE_UNIFICATION_ITALY_DESC0:" It was due to your rule and guidance that the Empire of $e_italy$ united under one ruler."
SUCCESSION_EVENT_WINDOW_END_DATE_UNIFICATION_AFRICA_DESC0:" It was due to your hard work
column3: and wise rule that the continent of Africa united under one rule."

column2: while your founding of the Kingdom of $k_portugal$ will be forever remembered?"

column1: SUCCESSION_EVENT_WINDOW_END_DATE_CREATED_CANARIAS_DESC0:" Everyone across the islands know your name as the founder of the Kingdom of $k_canarias$."
SUCCESSION_EVENT_WINDOW_END_DATE_CREATED_BOSNIA_DESC0:" There is not so much as a horse in Bosnia who does not know your name after the Kingdom of $k_bosnia$ was created."
SUCCESSION_EVENT_WINDOW_END_DATE_CREATED_ARMENIA_DESC0:" Your name will live on eternally as the founder of the Empire of $e_armenia$."
SUCCESSION_EVENT_WINDOW_END_DATE_CREATED_RUM_DESC0:" The Kingdom of $k_rum$ was created by you
column3: in a way it will always be yours."

column1: SUCCESSION_EVENT_WINDOW_END_DATE_CREATED_ISRAEL_DESC0:" It was due to your hard work and diligence that the Kingdom of $k_israel$ was created."
SUCCESSION_EVENT_WINDOW_END_DATE_CREATED_OUTREMER_DESC0:" None thought it could be done
column2: but you dominated the most contested holy region in the world as the Empire of $e_outremer$."

column1: SUCCESSION_EVENT_WINDOW_END_DATE_CREATED_SWITZERLAND_DESC0:" One may climb the Alps and still not see all that was yours after you founded the Kingdom of $k_switzerland$."

column2: the Archduchy is one of the most respected powers in Europe."

column1: SUCCESSION_EVENT_WINDOW_END_DATE_CREATED_ARAGON_DESC0:" The Kingdom of $k_aragon$ was born along the twisting banks of the Aragón river
column2: forever a testament to your glorious rule."
the cosmos knows that even if millennia pass with Rome in ashes
the Cornish men and women rose to become the Kingdom of $k_cornwall$ once again."
